DOC.brief_summary: The aim present study establish modify minimally invasive surgical technique sinus floor augmentation residual bone height 3-6mm . Hypothesis : The investigator expect present surgical technique allows achieve adequate implant bed least 10mm height heal period 3-5 month . Further modification technique enables reduce patient stress level .
DOC.brief_title: A Modified Sinus Floor Elevation Technique - Pilot Study 12 Patients
DOC.criteria: residual bone height 36mm residual bone width > 4mm treated periodontal disease smoker ( > 5cig/day ) acute chronic sinusitis
